title: Stratasys Earnings: 'Turnaround' For 3D Printer Maker?
text:
Ambarella Stock Plummets On Short-Seller's Report 
Highflying chip stock Ambarella (NASDAQ:AMBA) was winged by a negative report from short-seller Citron Research on Friday, falling hard for the second straight trading day on Monday. Ambarella, maker of video processing chips for GoPro (NASDAQ:GPRO) and others, saw its shares plummet 19%, near 96, ... 06/22/2015 01:18 PM ET Paris Air Show: Fewer Sales? 
3 Boeing (NYSE:BA) and Airbus (OTCPK:EADSY) may land fewer orders than average from the iconic Paris Air Show due to record backlogs and saturated growth markets. Lockheed Martin (NYSE:LMT) won't be flying its F-35. So emerging manufacturing techs like Stratasys' (NASDAQ:SSYS) 3-D printing are ... 06/10/2015 06:51 PM ET Will 3D Printers, Robots Be New Paris Air Show Stars? 
Lower-than-average Boeing (NYSE:BA) and Airbus (OTCPK:EADSY) orders are expected at the Paris Air Show next week due to record backlogs and saturated growth markets, giving manufacturing technologies like 3D printing a chance to shine. Stratasys (NASDAQ:SSYS), a maker of 3D printers, will be at the ... 06/10/2015 05:08 PM ET Navy Teams Up With 3D Systems To Develop 3D Printing 
3D Systems (NYSE:DDD) announced a partnership with a Naval Sea Systems Command division on Monday to develop 3D printing for military uses. The maker of 3D printers said its research and development agreement with the Naval Surface Warfare Center Carderock Division will help the Navy modernize ... 05/18/2015 12:27 PM ET 3D Systems Replaces CFO; Stock Hits 3-Year Low 
3D printing company 3D Systems (NYSE:DDD) replaced its CFO Friday, just six months after hiring him, sending its stock to a three-year low. 3D Systems said that it had reached a mutual separation agreement with Ted Hull, who "will leave the company in order to meet company needs and to pursue his ... 05/15/2015 01:54 PM ET NuVasive Hits 7-Year High After Q2 Earnings Beat 
Spinal-product specialist NuVasive (NASDAQ:NUVA) got an upgrade and two price-target increases Wednesday after its Q2 earnings beat estimates late Tuesday. The stock hit a seven-year high in early trading. NuVasive's profit rose 11% over the year-earlier quarter to 31 cents a share, beating ... 11:04 AM ET LinkedIn Q2 Earnings Come Amid Rough Transition 
LinkedIn (NYSE:LNKD), the networking site for professionals, is aiming to update its resume with improved earnings for Q2, after its Q1 didn't get the job done. Though LinkedIn beat estimates when it reported Q1 earnings after the close April 30, the stock plunged 19% the next day after the ... 08:02 AM ET 5 Hot Drug Stocks Top IBD's Big Cap Leaders Screen 
Biotechs, generic-drug makers and ethical-drug makers are some of the highest-ranked industry groups among the 197 that IBD tracks, and with recent view-topping earnings reports, FDA approvals and strategic divestments, they're proving their strength. Five hot drug stocks lead IBD's Screen Of The ... 07/28/2015 08:07 PM ET SunPower Q2 Revenue Falls Amid 8point3 Venture 
Solar energy manufacturer SunPower (NASDAQ:SPWR) continued its revenue slide late Tuesday when it reported its third straight sequential decline, with sales plummeting 39% from the year-earlier quarter, its biggest percentage decline since Q4 2011. The revenue drop comes five months after No. 2 ... 07/28/2015 07:06 PM ET Twitter Sales, Earnings Beat Consensus, But Stock Falls 
Twitter late Tuesday posted Q2 sales and earnings that exceeded Wall Street views, but the microblog's sluggish user growth remains a concern, and Twitter stock was down 7% in after-hours trading following the earnings release. The company continues to look for more mainstream growth as it searches ... 07/28/2015 07:04 PM ET
